ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Return of an Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: spittin mad: Illusion Iksar - The Iksar can see right through it making this spell almost useless in it s current form.  The only way I can see to make the
ygData.messageBody:
spittin mad:
Illusion Iksar - The Iksar can see right through it making this spell almost
useless in it's current form. The only way I can see to make the spell work
is to raise your faction with the Iksar so they won't kill you. But if you
are going to go to all this work what's the point of the spell in the first
place.

The faction for Agnostic enchanters needs to be raised so that they are at
least dubious with this illusion. I was able to get my faction up to
"Threateningly" by using illusion Iksar and benevolence so I know it's
possible to raise faction above KOS, just a pain.

never give up my enchanter:
breeze, clarity line - I'm the hit of any caster party
mez line - nothin feels better than ordering the party when to start/stop
attacking MOBs so you can park them

8)
- Shawn

-----Original Message-----
From: Craig Joyner [mailto:qrentqent@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 4:06 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Return of an Enchanter


Hallo all,

I've been on the list forever but haven't played in forever too... Just went

out and bought a copy of the original game-my computer isn't smart enough
166/32mb/4mb vid card-and I'm wondering about the optional files offered
when you first start up a copy of the game and click the 'play online'
button.(Not talking about the register Kunark button) I'm wondering if these

files are too much for my computer too handle, system spec wise, and what
they happen to contain.

And yes, I'm still going to play an Enchanter, again, even knowing how
annoying the class can be. I can't help it, Enchanters are without a doubt
the iconoclastic class in the game, the enigma to many, and seeing the mana
speed up spells I'm sure one of the most bothered classes-a'la SoW-in the
game, which is fine with me most times because I love chatting.

And Since I haven't played in about a year, I'll try to start up a debate!
What are the best and worst changes to the Enchanters as of late? What makes

you spittin mad and what makes you want to never give up the class??

thanks,

qrentqent aka

Mezma Dark Elf Enchanter L3, Seventh Hammer
